content: but there are great vendors with some really great eye selections sweet oddity art 17 helpful tips working on the opposite side of the chain this is an example picture start by creating your foundation chain the amount of chains will be given in your pattern work the stitches given across the chain now turn your work upside down into the remaining back loops of the chain stitches work the next stitches into the back chains across when you are finished the last stitch you made will be next to your first stitch *the number of stitches you make on one side of the chain should be the same amount on the opposite side of the chain depending on what you are making you may join the end of your round to the beginning with a slip_stitch or you may continue crocheting in a spiral fashion if you are to join this will be indicated in the pattern you are making * sweet oddity art 18
